abstract: Furman Center for Real Estate and Urban Policy at New York University has developed an interactive database that lets renters and buyers track nearly all the privately held subsidized housing in New York City; database covers about 304,800 affordable rental and co-op units in about 2,600 properties, letting users filter on a range of criteria.
snippet: The Furman Center for Real Estate and Urban Policy at N.Y.U. has developed an interactive database to help in the search.
lead_paragraph: The Furman Center for Real Estate and Urban Policy at N.Y.U. has developed an interactive database to help in the search.

headline.main: A Search for Subsidized Housing, Simplified
headline.seo: Posting - A Search for Subsidized Housing, Simplified
